metadata.title: Lux Gym - Your favorite gym in Šibenik
metadata.description: Your zone of strength and energy

cookies.title: Do you want a cookie?
cookies.description: We value your privacy. Essential cookies are always enabled because they are necessary for the website to function properly.

hero.imageAlt: A personal trainer demonstrates an exercise
hero.title: Zone of  <OutlineText>strength</OutlineText><lineBreak></lineBreak> and energy

openingHours.title: Opening Hours
openingHours.description: The gym is open Monday through Sunday, 7 a.m. to 10 p.m.

equipment.title: Top Equipment
equipment.description: Our equipment has been carefully selected to make your workout effective

capacity.title: MultiSport
capacity.description: Access to the largest network of diverse sports facilities. Fully digital, easy to use

atmosphere.title: Nice Atmosphere
atmosphere.description: Enjoy your workout in a peaceful environment where you can fully focus

training.title: One on one training
training.description: Fully personalized training tailored to your goals, without waiting or compromise. The perfect balance of attention and results.

advice.title: Advice and support
advice.description: You get support at all times, not only during training, but also through useful advice for everyday habits.

nutrition.title: Nutrition tips
nutrition.description: Get a simple and tasty nutrition plan tailored to your needs that will turn training fuel into results.

group.title: 2 on 1 Training
group.description: Enjoy dynamic training sessions with a partner. Share the path to results and save money, driven by collective energy and the guidance of a trainer.

membership.title: Monthly Membership
membership.description: Unlimited gym access for the entire month, no hidden costs.

familyMembership.title: Family Membership per Member
familyMembership.description: A better price for each member of your family. Save while you all work out together.

weekMembership.title: 1 Week Membership
weekMembership.description: Ideal for guests or for a trial period. Experience all the benefits of our membership.

workout.title: Gym 1 Workout
workout.description: Individual entry with no obligation. Perfect for those who like flexibility.

privateWorkout.title: Private Workout 1 hour
privateWorkout.description: An hour of time completely dedicated to you and your goals with a personal trainer.

workoutsPacket.title: 12 Private Workouts Package + Membership
workoutsPacket.description: The best package for maximum results. A combination of personal care and unlimited access.

workoutsPacketFor2.title: 12 Private Workouts Package + Membership / for 2 People
workoutsPacketFor2.description: Ideal for couples or friends. Share the path to results and save.

footer.learnMore: Learn more about us in the article

openingHours.title: Working Time
openingHours.description: Monday through Sunday, 7 a.m. to 10 p.m.
